transcript:
Agent: Hello, thank you for considering our company. My name is John, and I'm calling about our new energy-efficient water heater.
Customer: Oh, hi John. I've been looking into replacing my old water heater, so this is perfect timing.
Agent: Great, well, our product is top-of-the-line and can save you up to 30% on your energy bills.
Customer: That sounds amazing. What's the price point for this water heater?
Agent: We're currently offering a promotion for $1,200, which includes installation.
Customer: That's a bit higher than I was hoping to spend. Do you have any financing options available?
Agent: Yes, we do offer financing options with 0% interest for the first year.
Customer: Okay, that sounds doable. What kind of warranty do you offer?
Agent: Our water heater comes with a 10-year warranty, and we also offer a 5-year warranty on parts and labor.
Customer: That's great. Can you tell me more about the installation process?
Agent: Our installation team will come to your home, remove the old water heater, and install the new one, all in one day.
Customer: Okay, that sounds easy enough. How soon can the installation be done?
Agent: We can typically schedule installation within 3-5 business days.
Customer: Alright, I think I'm interested. Can you email me a formal quote and some more information?
Agent: Absolutely, I'll send that over to you right away.
Customer: Great, thank you, John. I look forward to reviewing it.
Agent: You're welcome, and I'll follow up with you in a few days to answer any questions you may have.
Customer: Sounds good, thanks again.
Agent: You're welcome, have a great day!
